stories.text:
I am an aspiring indie hacker and I want to learn from other successful and struggling indie hackers:

What was the biggest challenge on your journey to become an indie hacker? Did you give up or how did you overcome them?
stories.title: Ask HN: Biggest Challenges for Indie Hackers?
‘The worst person you know’: the man who unwittingly became a meme
Show HN: Livecode a Webserver in a Browser
Cloudflare's outage was human error. There's a way to make tech divinely forgive

stories.text: Just a small 60 pages book I wrote about how to get started with working out and nutrition. I personally found it difficult when I started, the information was all over the place so I thought writing a book like this could be useful! I know it's mostly about working out in a gym, but I hope to add more stuff to the book in the future. Let me know what you think, and contributions are welcomed!
stories.title: Show HN: Open-Source Book on Fitness
Saser: Sound amplification by stimulated emission of radiation
